name: Water Colors Painted Mason Jars - Set of 4
description:
These gorgeous mason jars are hand-painted by me and distressed for a shabby chic, cottage and beach feel. They are perfect for garden parties, showers, weddings and more. You may use water and fresh flowers in them as they are only painted on the outside.

I pride myself in creating unique colors and styles of painted and distressed shabby chic mason jars. "Beach Blues" is the home of the original! This is a unique and one of a kind color combination and title created by me. All others are copy-cats. Unauthorized use of these photos are strictly prohibited without written consent of Beach Blues.

This listing is 4 jars for $30. The colors are blush, light yellow, aqua and periwinkle. Each jar comes with a silver lid. The 2 outside jars are pint size and the 2 center jars are quart size.

THE JARS ARE SPRAYED WITH A WATER-RESISTANT ENAMEL, SO YOU MAY CLEAN THEM WITH A DAMP CLOTH, HOWEVER, SUBMERGING THEM IN WATER OR PLACING THEM IN THE DISHWASHER IS NOT RECOMMENDED.

**BECAUSE EACH JAR IS MADE TO ORDER, PLEASE EXPECT A 2 WEEK TURNAROUND TIME BEFORE SHIPMENT. SHIPPING IS PRIORITY VIA USPS AND TAKES 2-3 DAYS.

Thanks for shopping!

categories.name: s u m m e r

http://emmalinebride.com/inspiration/mint-wedding-ideas/#more-57678

Also featured in Smitten Magazine Spring/Summer 2013

Quart size Kerr wide mouth mason jars are painted and distressed for a vintage, beach and cottage look. Sets of 4 for $32. The colors are mint, blush, cream and white. The jars are 6 1/2" tall and 3" wide at the mouth.

Great for weddings centerpieces and garden parties. These jars are painted on the outside, so they are perfect for fresh flowers and water. 

I pride myself in creating unique colors and styles of painted and distressed shabby chic mason jars. "Beach Blues" is the home of the original! This is a unique and one of a kind color combination and title created by me. All others are copy-cats.

**BECAUSE EACH JAR IS MADE TO ORDER, PLEASE EXPECT A 2 WEEK TURNAROUND TIME BEFORE SHIPMENT. SHIPPING IS PRIORITY VIA USPS AND TAKES 2-3 DAYS.

name: Yosemite Winter Painted Mason Jars - Quart Size
description:
Growing up in the Sierra Nevada mountains, I had a lot of snowy Christmases. I remember we picked all kinds of berries and Mom made homemade jam. My favorite memories of Christmas were smelling the pine trees that never lost their green needles all winter long.

These beautiful hand-painted and distressed quart mason jars are perfect for hostess gifts and holiday centerpieces. Coupled with greenery and custom made wood slice ornaments, you can present your hostess or home with a beautiful reminder of how warm and inviting the holidays can be.

I pride myself in creating unique colors and styles of painted and distressed shabby chic mason jars. "Beach Blues" is the home of the original! ™ This is a unique and one of a kind color combination and title created by me. All others are copy-cats. Unauthorized use of these photos are strictly prohibited without written consent of Beach Blues.

This listing is 4 quart jars for $32. All jars come with lids. The colors are country blue, light grey, white and olive.

Love the beautiful custom wood slices? You can find them here at Anchored In Faith:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/AnchoredInFaith

THE JARS ARE SPRAYED WITH A WATER-RESISTANT ENAMEL, SO YOU MAY CLEAN THEM WITH A DAMP CLOTH, HOWEVER, SUBMERGING THEM IN WATER OR PLACING THEM IN THE DISHWASHER IS NOT RECOMMENDED.

**BECAUSE EACH JAR IS MADE TO ORDER, PLEASE EXPECT A 2 WEEK TURNAROUND TIME BEFORE SHIPMENT. SHIPPING IS PRIORITY VIA USPS AND TAKES 2-3 DAYS.

*Greenery and wood slices not included in this sale.

Thanks for shopping!

name: Roxy Girl - Painted and Distressed Mason Jars - Pint Size
description:
These beautiful little pint size mason jars can be used for an array of household items. They are great for fresh flowers and water, utensils, and candy!

Sets of 3 for $21. These colors are red, coral and light pink. Jars are 5" tall and opening is 2 1/2" wide. All jars come with lids.

I pride myself in creating unique colors and styles of painted and distressed shabby chic mason jars. "Beach Blues" is the home of the original! This is a unique and one of a kind color combination and title created by me. All others are copy-cats.

These jars are painted only on the outside. They are sprayed with a a water-resistant/scratch-resistant enamel, so you may clean the outside with a damp cloth, however, submerging them in water or placing them in the dishwasher is not recommended.

BECAUSE EACH JAR IS MADE TO ORDER, PLEASE EXPECT 2 WEEK TURNAROUND TIME BEFORE SHIPMENT. SHIPPING IS PRIORITY VIA USPS AND TAKES 2-3 DAYS

THESE JARS ARE LESS THAN 4 LBS, SO IN ORDER TO KEEP COSTS DOWN FOR INTERNATIONAL ORDERS (CANADA AND EVERYWHERE ELSE EXCEPT US), THEY WILL BE SHIPPED 1ST CLASS INTERNATIONAL. SHIPMENT USUALLY TAKES ABOUT 6-8 BUSINESS DAYS. FOR DOMESTIC ORDERS (US ONLY), PRIORITY SHIPPING WILL BE USED.

Thanks for shopping!
